title: Rewards for stakers in USDT protection pools on Opium.Finance
body:
We propose that the stakers of the following pools will receive following liquidity mining rewards proportional to their stake in the pool:

* Sell USDT protection 26 MAR - ~35% APR, 15’800 OPIUM
* Sell USDT Protection 19 MAR - ~60% APR, 1’500 OPIUM

Read full proposal and discussion on the governance forum: https://forum.opium.network/t/proposal-rewards-for-stakers-in-usdt-protection-pools-on-opium-finance/133/1
author: 0x55E170F82F50298188eecCe988e17046Dbef56A0
